pages.text: The $(item)Gem Bag$() is... a bag for holding gems. While in your inventory, any $(thing)Gems$() you pick up will be deposited straight into the $(item)Gem Bag$().$(br)$(bold)THIS INCLUDES DIAMONDS!$()$(br) Silent Gems adds a lot of different gems that give different effects when used to make tools or armor from Silent Gear. You will find a lot of these while mining, so the $(item)Gem Bag$() is there to keep them from clogging your inventory.
